title: When your team mate keeps the tank busy so you can carry.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Worst Mord NA,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MqIAdsHQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-11T11:10:37.387+0000)

> **you're** teammate 

https://media.giphy.com/media/12XMGIWtrHBl5e/200w.gif
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/520/073/eb9.jpg

I'm so tired of the grammar nazi thing it isn't even funny.

I honestly don't know what the fuck is even wrong

> When you're team mate keeps the tank busy so you can carry.

is the same as:

> When you are teammate keeps the tank busy so you can carry.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

It's above me never understood the other meanings of words like them.

Guess thats what happens when you skip English class your whole life.
It's fucked me over in my dreams to be a writer. Relearning grammar is not fun.

Well my problem is I had shitty parents. I didn't start school till I was 10.

I had to legit walk up to the school and enroll myself.
 
I ended up skipping 3 years of school so I could be with kids close to my  age.
Well... You seem okay so far
I'm good every were else it's just writing is the bane of my existence.

*everywhere*

**:-D**

I'm sorry... I had to do it once...

In all honesty though, good for you for not caring too much

We all have are great skills and are bad skills

Good for not focusing on the bad
http://67.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m7gjflCmu01rziwwco1_1280.gif
I know... Too bad it's the clone

0_0

Jesus Christ. That is crazy.
If it bothers you I will stop, I usually use it as a joke and not in order to tilt someone.
It honestly makes my eye twitch every time I see one.

I will stop posting it on your threads then
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
https://stickers.acidodivertido.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/Thank-you-The-Mask-Jim-Carrey-Telegram-Animated-Gifs-gifs.acidodivertido.com_.gif

[This link leads to a more humorous format explaining the correct usage of your vs. you're](http://theoatmeal.com/comics/apostrophe).
Your is a possessive indicating that you _own_ something. For example: "Your build is terrible, stop building Athene's on Riven."
You're is a contraction used to shorten _you are_. For example: "You're going to end up in Wood 5 if you don't get a Black Cleaver from now on."
When in doubt, try saying the sentence out loud, except saying "you are" where the your/you're is in the sentence. If it doesn't make sense to say "You are build is terrible," then don't use an apostrophe.

https://themidnightalliance.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/make-it-stop.gif?w=720
http://cdn4.gurl.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/sad-gif.gif

I'm sorry my fellow Mordekaiser main.
https://media.giphy.com/media/rvDtLCABDMaqY/giphy.gif
I just wanted to cheer you up.
{{champion:82}} "Misery loves company." {{champion:82}}

Your -> used with possession: "Your car"
You're (you are) -> used with description, like in the OP

I don't know why the English language has all these dumb rules and technicalities...

it's just about being a functional human being. If you are a functional human being grammar is generally not an issue for you. If grammar and/or spelling is an issue for you it tends to be a strong sign that you are not a productive member of society.
actually your is what is used for plural and you're is what is used for you are.

I believe it's from a game called Tales of Xillia.
